shape_3_per_frame1=sample=instance/num_inst;
shape_3_per_frame2=r = .4*sin(sample*80);
shape_3_per_frame3=g = .8*sin(sample*66);
shape_3_per_frame4=b = .6*sin(sample*120);
shape_3_per_frame5=
shape_3_per_frame6=//////  shifter's cube
shape_3_per_frame7=
shape_3_per_frame8=it = it+1;
shape_3_per_frame9=sz = 1;
shape_3_per_frame10=ss = sample*6;
shape_3_per_frame11=ox = sz*.5*pow(-1,it)*below(ss,1) + .5*pow(-1,it)*above(ss,1)*sz*below(ss,2) + above(ss,2)*.5*pow(-1,it)*sz*below(ss,3);
shape_3_per_frame12=oy = (ss-.5)*sz*below(ss,1) + sz*.5*above(ss,1)*below(ss,2) + (.5-(ss-2))*sz*above(ss,2)*below(ss,3);
shape_3_per_frame13=oz = -sz*.5*below(ss,1) + ((ss-1)-.5)*sz*above(ss,1)*below(ss,2) + sz*.5*above(ss,2)*below(ss,3);
shape_3_per_frame14=ox = ox + above(ss,3)*below(ss,4)*-.5*sz + above(ss,4)*below(ss,5)*sz*(-.5+(ss-4)) + above(ss,5)*sz*.5;
shape_3_per_frame15=oy = oy + above(ss,3)*below(ss,4)*.5*sz*pow(-1,it) + above(ss,4)*below(ss,5)*sz*-.5 + above(ss,5)*sz*(-.5+(ss-5));
shape_3_per_frame16=oz = oz + above(ss,3)*below(ss,4)*sz*(.5-(ss-3)) + above(ss,4)*below(ss,5)*sz*.5*pow(-1,it) + above(ss,5)*sz*.5*pow(-1,it);
shape_3_per_frame17=
shape_3_per_frame18=
shape_3_per_frame19=//////rotations .... by flexi
shape_3_per_frame20=
shape_3_per_frame21=my_x=ox;
shape_3_per_frame22=my_y=oy;
shape_3_per_frame23=my_z=oz;
shape_3_per_frame24=
shape_3_per_frame25=d = 2.3;    
shape_3_per_frame26=zoom = 1;
shape_3_per_frame27=
shape_3_per_frame28=w1 = q1;
shape_3_per_frame29=w2 = q3;
shape_3_per_frame30=w3 = q2;
shape_3_per_frame31=
shape_3_per_frame32=x1 = cos(w1)*my_x + sin(w1)*my_y;
shape_3_per_frame33=y1 = -sin(w1)*my_x + cos(w1)*my_y;
shape_3_per_frame34=z1 = my_z;
shape_3_per_frame35=
shape_3_per_frame36=x2 = cos(w2)*x1 + sin(w2)*z1;
shape_3_per_frame37=z2 = -sin(w2)*x1 + cos(w2)*z1;
shape_3_per_frame38=y2 = y1;
shape_3_per_frame39=
shape_3_per_frame40=y3 = cos(w3)*y2 + sin(w3)*z2;
shape_3_per_frame41=z3 = -sin(w3)*y2 + cos(w3)*z2;
shape_3_per_frame42=x3 = x2;
shape_3_per_frame43=
shape_3_per_frame44=// perspective calculation
shape_3_per_frame45=
shape_3_per_frame46=l = sqrt(x3*x3 + y3*y3);
shape_3_per_frame47=w = atan2(x3,y3);
shape_3_per_frame48=p = tan(asin(1) + atan2(d+z3,l));
shape_3_per_frame49=d = sqrt(x3*x3 + y3*y3 + (z3+d)*(z3+d));
shape_3_per_frame50=
shape_3_per_frame51=my_x = zoom*sin(w)*p;
shape_3_per_frame52=my_y = zoom*cos(w)*p;
shape_3_per_frame53=
shape_3_per_frame54=
shape_3_per_frame55=p1 = .03*sin(sample*(10+9*sin(q1)));
shape_3_per_frame56=p2 = .03*sin(sample*(10+9*sin(q2)));
shape_3_per_frame57=
shape_3_per_frame58=x = .5+my_x+p1;
shape_3_per_frame59=y = .5+my_y+p2;
per_frame_1=chng=sin(time*.5);
per_frame_2=cthr=.9999;
per_frame_3=mq21=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq21);
per_frame_4=mq22=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq22);
per_frame_5=mq23=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq23);
per_frame_6=mq24=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq24);
per_frame_7=mq25=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq25);
per_frame_8=mq26=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq26);
per_frame_9=mq27=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1),mq27);
per_frame_10=mq28=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1),mq28);
per_frame_11=mq29=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1)*.3,mq29);
per_frame_12=mq30=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1)*.3,mq30);
per_frame_13=monitor=chng;
per_frame_14=q21=mq21;q22=mq22;q23=mq23;q24=mq24;q25=mq25;q26=mq26;
per_frame_15=q27=mq27;q28=mq28;q29=mq29;q30=mq30;
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=monitor=mq1;
per_frame_18=zoom=1;
per_frame_19=wave_a=0;
per_frame_20=warp = 0;
per_frame_21=decay=0;
per_frame_22=
per_frame_23=//// Flexi's beat counter
per_frame_24=
per_frame_25=bt1 = bt1*0.95 + sqr(bass*2)*30/fps;
per_frame_26=mt1 = mt1*0.95 + sqr(mid*2)*30/fps;
per_frame_27=tt1 = tt1*0.95 + sqr(treb*2)*30/fps;
per_frame_28=bt2 = bt2 + bt1*0.003;
per_frame_29=mt2 = mt2 + mt1*0.003;
per_frame_30=tt2 = tt2 + tt1*0.003;
per_frame_31=
per_frame_32=q1 = bt2 *0.03;
per_frame_33=q2 = mt2 *0.03;
per_frame_34=q3 = tt2 *0.03;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`float2 zoom = 2;
warp_5=`float2 cntr = float2(-0,-0);
warp_6=`float2 c = float2(0.6,0.6); // complex constant
warp_7=`
warp_8=` float2 my_uv = (uv-0.5-cntr)*zoom;
warp_9=` my_uv = float2(my_uv.x*my_uv.x - my_uv.y*my_uv.y, 2*my_uv.x*my_uv.y) + c; // u -> u^2 + c
warp_10=`
warp_11=`zoom =1.81;
warp_12=`cntr = float2(0,0);
warp_13=`c = float2(0.448,0.701);
warp_14=`
warp_15=` float2 my_uv2 = (uv_orig-0.5-cntr)*zoom; // using uv_orig here - no contortion to the nice julia island
warp_16=` my_uv2 = float2(my_uv2.x*my_uv2.x - my_uv2.y*my_uv2.y, 2*my_uv2.x*my_uv2.y) + c; // u -> u^2 + c
warp_17=`
warp_18=`//ret.x = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, my_uv).x - 0.1;
warp_19=`ret = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, my_uv2) - 0.004;
warp_20=`
warp_21=` my_uv = lerp(my_uv, my_uv2, 0.5);
warp_22=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_23=`                      ((uv.xyy*q27
warp_24=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_25=`                      ).xyz*
warp_26=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_27=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q29
warp_28=`                     );
warp_29=`if(ret.x> q21*roam_cos.y && ret.x<= q24*roam_sin.x)ret.y -= (noise9).x*.5; 
warp_30=`if(ret.y> q22*roam_sin.x && ret.y<= q25*roam_cos.x)ret.z -= (noise9).y*.5; 
warp_31=`if(ret.z> q23*roam_cos.x && ret.z<= q26*roam_sin.y)ret.x -= (noise9).z*.5; 
warp_32=`
warp_33=`
warp_34=`}
comp_1=`float3 ret1, neu, crisp, blur;
comp_2=`float2 uv2, uv3;
comp_3=`
comp_4=`shader_body
comp_5=`{
comp_6=`float ang2, c, s;
comp_7=`uv -= 0.5;
comp_8=`uv *= aspect.xy;    
comp_9=`
comp_10=`float2 tmp = uv;
comp_11=`float dist = 1;
comp_12=`float inten = 1;
comp_13=`float mask = 0;
comp_14=`ret1 = 0;
comp_15=`int anz = 3;
comp_16=`float n = 0;
comp_17=`float t_rel = q29;
comp_18=`while (n <= anz) {
comp_19=`    ang2 = 6.28*n/anz+q30;
comp_20=`    c = cos(ang2);
comp_21=`    s = sin(ang2);
comp_22=`    uv2.x =  uv.x*c - uv.y*s;
comp_23=`    uv2.y =  uv.x*s + uv.y*c;
comp_24=`    uv2*= aspect.yx;
comp_25=`
comp_26=`    dist = 1-frac(n/anz+t_rel); //evtl sqrt !
comp_27=`
comp_28=`    inten =  4*dist*(1-dist*dist);
comp_29=`    uv3 = 3*uv2*dist + 0.5+.0*float2(q5,q6);
comp_30=`    crisp = GetPixel(uv3);
comp_31=`    blur = GetBlur1(frac(uv3)) * float3 (.8,.9,1);
comp_32=`    ret1 = max(ret1,(crisp+blur)*inten);
comp_33=`n++;
comp_34=`}
comp_35=`
comp_36=`
comp_37=`float3 ret1 = ret1 ;
comp_38=`//ret1 = GetPixel(.5+uv_orig*aspect.yx*1.2);
comp_39=`
comp_40=`
comp_41=`ret = ret1;
comp_42=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
comp_43=`                      ((uv.xyy*q28
comp_44=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
comp_45=`                      ).xyz*
comp_46=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
comp_47=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q30 
comp_48=`                     );
comp_49=`if(ret.x> q26*roam_cos.y && ret.x<= q23*roam_sin.x)ret.z -= (noise9).x*.5; 
comp_50=`if(ret.y> q25*roam_sin.x && ret.y<= q22*roam_cos.x)ret.x -= (noise9).y*.5; 
comp_51=`if(ret.z> q24*roam_cos.x && ret.z<= q21*roam_sin.y)ret.y -= (noise9).z*.5; 
comp_52=`
comp_53=`}
